description: An AuxiliaryTrafficSpace is a space within the transportation space not intended for traffic purposes.

properties.name: class
properties.description: Indicates the specific type of the AuxiliaryTrafficSpace.

properties.name: function
properties.description: Specifies the intended purposes of the AuxiliaryTrafficSpace.

properties.name: usage
properties.description: Specifies the actual uses of the AuxiliaryTrafficSpace.

properties.name: granularity
properties.description: Defines whether auxiliary traffic spaces are represented by individual ways or by individual lanes, depending on the desired level of spatial and semantic decomposition.
